attributes.action: extend the legislation protecting nhs workers against assault.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there should be greater enforcement of the current legislation regarding assaults of nhs staff.  they should be allowed to refuse treatment to those who are constantly abusive, verbally and physically.  also tougher sentences should be passed on those who do assault nhs workers, they should be jailed, and not just have to serve community service

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
